general purpose metric screw thread—tolerances international organization standardization standard metric screw thread tolerances1 specifies basic profile general purpose metric screw threads conforming 2612
tolerance system refers basic profile accordance field application purpose defined specifies tolerance system screw threads diameter upwards3
thread tolerancesedit

partsedit
standard consists following parts

9651 principles basic data
9652 limits sizes general purpose external internal screw threads medium quality
9653 deviations constructional screw threads
9654 limits sizes hotdip galvanized external screw threads mate internal screw threads tapped tolerance position galvanizing
9655 limits sizes internal screw threads mate hotdip galvanized external screw threads maximum size tolerance position galvanizing

referencesedit



general purpose metric screw threads tolerances part principles basic data international organization standardization september 2013 retrieved january 2017
malaysian standard sectorial catalogue mechanical systems componentssourcegovernment malaysia
application described book transactions technical conference metric mechanical fasteners part 3sourcegoogle bookspublished american national standards institute york
limits metric standard coarse threads according
